Description: This Role is the default Role for stock management with basic functionality with less privileges
Privileges: App: stockmanagement.dashboard; App: stockmanagement.stockItems; App: stockmanagement.stockoperations; Get Concepts; Get Locations; Get Users; Get Roles; App: stockmanagement.stockSources;App: stockmanagement.stockOperationType; Task: stockmanagement.party.read

Description: This enables managing stock management operations accross the stock management application
Privileges: Task: stockmanagement.stockItems.mutate; Task: stockmanagement.stockoperations.mutate; Task: stockmanagement.stockoperations.approve; Task: stockmanagement.stockSources.mutate; Task: stockmanagement.stockoperations.receiveitems

Description: This Role enables full access to stock management application
This Role enables access to daily stock operations
This Role enables a provider to view inventory items and access quantities available
Privileges: App: stockmanagement.stockItems; Get Concepts; Get Locations; Get Users; App: stockmanagement.stockSources; App: stockmanagement.stockOperationType; Task: stockmanagement.party.read; Task: stockmanagement.stockItems.dispense.qty

Description: This Role enables a provider to dispence inventory items
This Role enables a provider to access reports
Privileges: App: stockmanagement.reports; Task: stockmanagement.reports.mutate; Manage Scheduler; Get Patients
